channel.title: Can i please have an unban?
channel.description: Guys i've realllllylyyy learned my lesson, can i please by apart of the server again i really miss it :(.

item.title: Can i please have an unban?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I doubt David or MITB will take in comments from the community, but I would like to put in my opinion.

Yes, everyone deserves a second chance; but, what all did you do? You supposedly used a ‘hack client’ to log onto others’ accounts and some how drop them (there is no proof to say it was you, but there was hundreds of accusations), you accused me of logging on to your account, and stealing items from you, you majorly griefed multiple people, structures, and land, and more to come, though I cannot think of them at this time.

Yes, you deserve another chance, but perhaps a later date. I think you should be able to show more maturity, and possibly have vouches towards your maturing?

Though, this is all just my opinion.[/quote]

This is true, everyone deserves a second chance, yes, but what Davidi2 says Applies, maybe when he thinks about what he has done, and becomes more mature.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i please have an unban?

item.title: Can i please have an unban?
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:41, topic:387873”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=483668.msg3545415#msg3545415 date=1301166933]

what?

I saw your rep was 65, and knew that wasnt right, then remembered it’s I_code_rsps

No user exists with that name. His account joined July 2010.

I’m pretty sure he was banned…

abatswhatever was banned and you can still view his profile.

Wasn’t there a user name I_code_rsps?
[/quote]
That was his server user.

[quote author=i code rsps link=topic=475552.msg3477496#msg3477496 date=1295816351]
Ranger don’t even try to defend yourself, you were threatening to grief.
[/quote][/quote]

yeah.

Read full topic
